code: import React from"react";import"./ChartBar.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ChartBar=function ChartBar(props){var fillHeight='0%';if(props.maxValue>0){fillHeight="".concat(Math.round(props.value/props.maxValue*100),"%");}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-bar__inner",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-bar__fill",style:{height:fillHeight}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-bar__label",children:props.label})]});};export default ChartBar;
